hero.description: Where tradition meets innovation. Crafting high-performance soles with cutting-edge technology and artisanal expertise for the global footwear industry.

product.description: Custom soles for every need, designed to combine functionality, comfort, and style. Adaptable to all types of footwear - from safety shoes to fashion.

materials.title: Mastered Materials & Technologies
materials.description: Casa Semelle masters all major sole materials, ensuring the perfect balance between innovation, durability, and comfort. We manufacture custom soles for brands, manufacturers, and artisans.

eva.name: EVA (High Density)
eva.description: Lightweight, versatile, and highly resistant. Perfect for comfort and performance.

rubber.name: Rubber / Caoutchouc
rubber.description: Maximum durability and excellent grip. Ideal for safety and industrial footwear.

pu.name: PU / TPU / TR
pu.description: Advanced polyurethane materials. Superior flexibility and long-lasting performance.

leather.name: Leather & PVC
leather.description: Natural and synthetic materials. Classic elegance meets modern functionality.

lightSole.title: Safety & Industrial Soles
lightSole.description: Robust protection with comfort. Designed for demanding work environments.

orthopedicSoles.title: Casual & City Soles
orthopedicSoles.description: Everyday comfort and style. Perfect balance of functionality and aesthetics.

flatHeelSoles.title: Sandals & Slides
flatHeelSoles.description: Summer comfort and durability. Lightweight designs for warm weather footwear.

fashionSole.title: Custom Designer Soles
fashionSole.description: Exclusive designs with custom colors, densities, branding, and logos for your brand.

aboutLegacy.subtitle: Historic leader in sole manufacturing - combining industrial excellence with unmatched expertise

1995.description: Casa Semelle was founded on January 16, 1995, in Casablanca with a clear vision: to become Morocco's reference in sole manufacturing through quality and innovation.

2020.description: Achieved #1 position in the Moroccan market, earning the trust of major local brands and establishing ourselves as the go-to partner for quality soles.

2022.description: Partnership with Inditex Group validates our capacity to meet world-class standards. Expanded material expertise across EVA, Rubber, PU, TPU, TR, and Leather.

today.description: The historic leader serving major brands, industrial workshops, artisans, and international groups. Modern machinery combined with expert craftsmanship makes us the undisputed reference.

expertise.title: 30+ Years of Excellence
expertise.description: Founded in 1995, Casa Semelle has rapidly become Morocco's #1 sole manufacturer. Our team of highly skilled professionals masters the art of blending materials and technologies, creating diverse, customized solutions tailored to each customer's unique requirements - from major international brands to local artisans.

innovation.title: Complete Material Mastery
innovation.description: We master all major sole materials: EVA high density, Rubber, PU, TPU, TR, Leather, PVC, and prefabricated soles. Our modern industrial machinery and expertise allow us to deliver exceptional quality across safety footwear, casual shoes, sandals, and custom designer solutions with superior performance and comfort.

flexibility.title: Partnership with Global Brands
flexibility.description: Casa Semelle is trusted by world-renowned groups including Inditex, confirming our ability to meet the highest international standards. We serve major Moroccan brands, industrial workshops, and artisans alike - delivering premium quality, on-time delivery, and exemplary consistency regardless of project scale.

description.paragraph1: Morocco's #1 sole manufacturer, combining modern machinery with expert craftsmanship. Trusted partner of major international brands.
description.paragraph2: Cutting-edge facilities handling any scale - custom orders to large production. Mastering 8+ materials with unmatched flexibility.
description.paragraph3: Custom solutions with designers and brands: colors, densities, branding, logos. Quality consistency that earned partnerships like Inditex.

contact.title: Let's Start a Conversation
contact.subtitle: Ready to elevate your footwear? Reach out today and discover how our expertise can bring your vision to life.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you shortly

hero.subtitle: Casa Semelle is the historic leader and number one in the Moroccan market for shoe sole manufacturing. With decades of expertise, we are the reference in the footwear and sole industry in Morocco.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide footwear manufacturers with innovative, durable, and high-performance soles that meet international standards and the specificities of the Moroccan market. We combine industrial excellence with customized solutions.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To showcase Moroccan expertise in the footwear industry globally, serving performance, comfort, and durability. We aim to be the preferred partner for major brands and manufacturers across Morocco and internationally.

promise.title: Our Commitment
promise.description: Recognized expertise and dominant presence in the local market. Collaboration with world-renowned groups like Inditex. Modern industrial machinery and high production capacity. On-time delivery and exemplary quality consistency.

timeline.subtitle: From our foundation to becoming Morocco's undisputed leader in sole manufacturing

1995.title: Foundation of Casa Semelle
1995.description: Established on January 16, 1995, in Casablanca with a clear mission: to become the reference in sole manufacturing in Morocco

2020.title: Market Leadership
2020.description: Achieved position as Morocco's #1 sole manufacturer, gaining trust of major local footwear brands and establishing dominant market presence

2022.title: International Recognition
2022.description: Partnership with Inditex Group and other international clients, confirming our ability to meet the highest global standards

2024.title: Industrial Expansion
2024.description: Expanded production capacity with modern machinery, mastering all major sole materials from EVA to leather, serving safety, casual, and designer footwear

today.title: Industry Pioneer
today.description: Historic leader serving major Moroccan brands, industrial workshops, artisans, and international groups. The undisputed reference in Moroccan sole manufacturing

values.subtitle: The principles that made us Morocco's trusted sole manufacturing leader

quality.title: Excellence & Quality
quality.description: Our reputation is built on exemplary quality consistency and rigorous standards. Every sole meets international requirements while respecting delivery commitments.

trust.title: Trust & Expertise
trust.description: Recognized expertise that earned us partnerships with world-class groups. Our clients trust us for our technical mastery and production reliability.

innovation.title: Innovation & Technology
innovation.description: Modern industrial machinery and constant development of new solutions. We master all materials: EVA, Rubber, PU, TPU, TR, Leather, PVC, and prefabricated soles.

customer.title: Custom Solutions
customer.description: Made-to-measure development for manufacturers and brands: custom colors, densities, branding, and logos. From cobblers to major brands, we adapt to every need.

team.subtitle: Skilled professionals driving Moroccan excellence in sole manufacturing

cta.subtitle: Join major brands who trust Casa Semelle for their sole manufacturing needs. Experience the expertise that made us the reference in the industry.

message.paragraph1: Since its inception, Casa Semelle has had a clear mission: to offer the Moroccan and international markets high-quality soles capable of meeting the requirements of the biggest brands.
message.paragraph2: Today, we are proud to be the leader of the national market, recognized for our expertise, our seriousness, and our commitment to our customers. Our collaboration with international groups testifies to our ability to meet the highest standards.
message.paragraph3: Our ambition remains the same: to continue innovating, strengthening local industry, and showcasing Moroccan expertise.
message.paragraph4: Thank you to all our partners for their trust. Together, we are moving towards an even more ambitious future.

leadership.title: Market Leadership
leadership.description: Morocco's #1 sole manufacturer, trusted by major brands and international groups.

growth.title: Continuous Innovation
growth.description: Investing in technology and expertise to strengthen local industry and meet global standards.

commitment.title: Customer First
commitment.description: Dedicated to excellence, reliability, and building lasting partnerships based on trust.
